subject: Return
description_text: Hi, I needed to return a product I bought as a gift and no longer need. I received it on December 1st, 2025 & the order number is #SSN3663.

conversations.body_text: Hello. I haven’t heard anything back & the link I received says I don’t have access to it.
Hi Kaylie New,    I'm sorry to hear that. May I ask why you'd like to return the item? Is there a problem with the product?  Merry Christmas!
